introduction: 99 percent of the citizens of Parajd (now located in Romania) are Hungarian. There are a bit more reformed people than catholics. The people are cutting wood and cultivating the not-so-good quality soil for a living, some of them has got a job in the local mine. The village has got a brass band well known throughout the country. It's salt mine is known for its curative powers. In Hargita county the number of youths commititng suicide is the highest in Parajd.
